MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Hendy Road, Clayton Road and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.24PM. Our engineers are on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.03PM on 10th January 2021.
